title: Game crashes during ranked champion select
body: Game crashes while in champ select. apparently only happening to dynamic queue. IM LOSING LP FOR THIS>{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Crashing in champ select can be cause by third party programs that aren't playing well with league.  Remove any apps you might have running like play.tv or any of the like.  If your issue persists then you may have a network problem failing to maintain a connection and ultimately kicking you out.  For this, your best bet would be to check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!
